summary: Convert between Markdown and HTML formats for document processing and content transformation.
description: ## Overview The Markdown package enables conversion between Markdown and HTML formats. Use it when you need to convert web content to Markdown for processing, or render Markdown content as HTML for display.

html_to_md.name: Html_to_md
html_to_md.summary: Converts HTML content to Markdown format using the html-to-markdown library.
html_to_md.howItWorks: The HTML to Markdown node converts HTML content to Markdown format. When executed, the node: 1. Retrieves the HTML content based on the Input Mode setting: * Text mode: Uses the HTML content provided directly * File mode: Reads HTML content from the specified file path * URL mode: Fetches HTML content from the provided URL 2. Processes the HTML through the html-to-markdown library to convert it to Markdown 3. Outputs the converted Markdown text 4. If Output Mode is set to File, also saves the Markdown to the specified file path
usage: For File mode: Valid file path with readable HTML content
For URL mode: Valid URL accessible from the execution environment
For proxy usage: Valid proxy configuration when needed
bestPractices: The node supports multiple input methods for flexibility
Proxy settings are only used when Input Mode is set to URL
When using URL mode, ensure the target server is accessible
File paths should be absolute or relative to the execution environment
Output file path will be created if it doesn't exist, but directory must exist
TLS verification should only be skipped in trusted environments
